author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Polymet Restructures Glencore Debt
text:
March 26 (Reuters) - Polymet Mining Corp:
* POLYMET RESTRUCTURES GLENCORE DEBT * POLYMET MINING CORP - SECURES COMMITMENT FOR ADDITIONAL $80 MILLION IN DEBENTURES
* POLYMET MINING - TERMS OF REFINANCING AGREEMENT EXTENDS TERM OF $152 MILLION OF SECURED CONVERTIBLE, NON-CONVERTIBLE DEBENTURES TO MARCH 31, 2019
* POLYMET MINING - COâ€™S UNIT NEGOTIATED 12-MONTH PAYMENT EXTENSION & REDUCTION IN INTEREST RATES ON ABOUT $152 MILLION OF DEBT OWED TO GLENCORE AG Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
